Hammond.Forest\u2013Southview Residential Histor: Forest–Southview Residential Historic District is a national historic district located at Hammond, Lake County, Indiana. The district encompasses 39 contributing buildings and 1 contributing site in an exclusively residential section of Hammond. It developed between about 1912 and 1949, and includes notable example of Renaissance Revival, Colonial Revival, Tudor Revival, and Bungalow / American Craftsman styles of residential architecture.
